title: Did a Christian school fire a student to wear a rainbow jacket?
subtitle: The Whitfield Academy in Kentucky cited the testimony of a 15-year-old student about alleged past violations of the law and "a position of morality and cultural acceptance" contrary to the school's beliefs in a photo posted on Facebook in December 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Whitfield Academy in Kentucky fired a 15-year-old student for wearing a rainbow jacket and putting a rainbow-made birthday cake on Facebook.
